channel.title: Infrastructure on Portfolio

item.title: Pi-5 Upgrade
item.description: Introduction We wanted on off the network set of machines that we able to be controlled by us. This means that we were able to install software on the machines without requesting the IT Support staff. Who are very busy which means sometimes it takes ages for resources to be added that can reduce learning time. When we first got and setup the Pi’s neither of us had very much experience so we just set them up
